name: Kirsty S
text: I booked for three of us to go on the lakes and canyon tour and would highly recommend. Our guide Andrey took great care of us throughout the day (and it was a long day!). If you're looking for a unique experience round some of Kazakhstan's most beautiful natural sites, this is the place to book!!

name: Nata T
text: We had a wonderful trip with Hakhim, that Andrey organised. Seeing the canyon and lakes was definitely on our Almaty ‘bucket list’ and we were knowledgeable, friendly, and ready-to-do-eveything guide. It was such a wonderful time that we are still   talking about it to friends (and sharing our photos) 6 months later.

name: Loic G
text: I highly recommend travelling with Andrei and Dima, they are very Andrei and Dima, they are very all your questions quickly! We had an incredible experience and these guides are now friends. Spassiba!
